metadata.name: Atmosfera
metadata.description:
1/1 minted by Hulki Okan Tabak, Soundscapes smart contract, 2023

Atmosfera is an original music composition by HoT.

It has been minted in to a single edition music NFT on Manifold deployed Soundscapes smart contract. 

It is presented with visuals from HoT's artworks that are exclusively used for this nft.

The collector will get the original WAV file upon asking. 

The piece was composed and recorded entirely on Garage Band in late 2020.

Music NFTs are minted as "full copyright" NFTs. In addition to standard viewing/listening and resale rights, the collector holds full commercial rights which are transferable and non-expiring. Selling this NFT to a new collector facilitates that transfer. 

The creator can freely use the music for his artistic and/or commercial purposes for the duration of his life.
